description: This file defines FastAPI route handlers for managing diet plans, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting diet plans with ownership and permission checks.

methods.name: list_diet_plans( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), offset_limit: tuple[int, int] = Depends(pagination_params), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list diet plans with pagination, considering user roles for ownership filtering.

methods.name: create_diet_plan( payload: DietPlanCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new diet plan for a client, enforcing ownership.

methods.name: get_diet_plan( plan_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific diet plan by ID, with ownership verification.

methods.name: update_diet_plan( plan_id: int, payload: DietPlanCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing diet plan, with ownership and client restrictions.

methods.name: delete_diet_plan( plan_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a diet plan, with ownership enforcement.

ctags.name: create_diet_plan
ctags.signature: ( payload: DietPlanCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: delete_diet_plan
ctags.signature: ( plan_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: get_diet_plan
ctags.signature: ( plan_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: list_diet_plans
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), offset_limit: tuple[int, int] = Depends(pagination_params), )

ctags.name: update_diet_plan
ctags.signature: ( plan_id: int, payload: DietPlanCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
